name: Mystery Zone
effect: Once during each playerâ€™s turn (before he or she attacks), if that player has an Evolution card in his or her hand, he or she may search his or her deck for a basic Energy card, show it to his or her opponent, and put it into his or her hand. Then that player chooses an Evolution card from his or her hand, shows it to his or her opponent, and puts it into his or her deck. That player shuffles his or her deck afterward.
author: Ken Ikuji
